item.description:
This worked last time so we're going for it again.

EACH OF US IS GOING TO BRING THREE $20 BILLS. At the beginning of the night you will pass it off to a wingman. For every set you open, you get $20 back. YOU WILL OPEN 3 SETS BY THE END OF THE NIGHT! We will all mostly likely get a number close by the third set. If not, your AA should be gone by the last one to continue on and get a # close by the end of the night.

I've done this before with wings and it works awesome!

I figure we'll meet up at Margaritas in East Hartford. We'll figure out what bar to hit up first and jump right on the highway to head up there.

If you havent gone to a meeting yet: we're gonna pick out a corner of the bar area.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the Bar area
item.why: You don't learn getting better with woman from a book. You have to get into the field.
item.name: Back to Springfield!!
